channel.title: Primal Instinct Development Team [637/639]
channel.description:
Pictures should be here in 1-3 hours ;D [center][img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/6023/cooltext708616307.gif[/img] [/center] [u][b]Server Base[/b][/u]: Quantum 637/639 [u][b]Our Goals[/b][/u]: Duel Arena Castle Wars Perfect Economy Perfect Logos [color=black](Look at the one at the top I can't make shit logo's wise.)[/color] Vote 4 Cash [color=black](Should be very easy we just need website first.)[/color] Webclient [color=black](Should also be very easy we just need website first.)[/color] Professional Website VPS Host [color=black](We probably won't get this until we release server and get donations)[/color] We will have many more goals once we get started and get a good look at the source and find glitches and get ideas. [b][u]Staff Positions Jobs and requirements:[/u][/b] Head Developer (In Game Owner) - Manage and keep staff make sure staff are doing there jobs - Code server to an extent - Code client to an extent - Server Advertisement Server Developers (In Game Administrators) - Complex server coding - Keep moderators and players in check when not coding - Must have 6 months+ experience and show an example of your work. Client Developer (In Game Moderator/Administrator May Vary) - Pack cache - Work with Web Designer on any Webclient Issues - Must have 4 months+ experience and show an example of your work Website Developer (In Game Moderator) - Make Professional Website - Make Logos - Advertisement - MySQL servers - When not busy keep players in check - Must show an example of your work [b][u]Open Staff Positions: [/u][/b] [s]Head Developer (In Game Owner) [1/1][/s] [s] Nick/Cia Nick[/s] Server Developers (In Game Administrators)[0/2] Open Open Client Developer (In Game Moderator/Administrator May Vary)[0/1] Open Website Developer (In Game Moderator) [0/1] Open [b][u]How to Apply: [/u][/b] Apply Below in this format
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: Do you have Skype? If you answer yes what is your Skype Name: Do you have Xbox? If you answer yes what is your Gamertag: What position do you want? (Webdesign, Client Coder, Server Coder): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\

item.title: Primal Instinct Development Team [637/639]
item.dc:creator: @cia_nick cia nick
item.description:
@cia_nick wrote:

Pictures should be here in 1-3 hours ;D
[center]
[/center]

Server Base: Quantum 637/639

Our Goals: Duel Arena

            Castle Wars

            Perfect Economy

            Perfect Logos [color=black](Look at the one at the top I can't make shit logo's wise.)[/color] 

            Vote 4 Cash [color=black](Should be very easy we just need website first.)[/color]

            Webclient [color=black](Should also be very easy we just need website first.)[/color]

            Professional Website
            
            VPS Host [color=black](We probably won't get this until we release server and get donations)[/color]

We will have many more goals once we get started and get a good look at the source and find glitches and get ideas.

Staff Positions Jobs and requirements:

Head Developer (In Game Owner)

  • Manage and keep staff make sure staff are doing there jobs

  • Code server to an extent

  • Code client to an extent

  • Server Advertisement

Server Developers (In Game Administrators)

  • Complex server coding

  • Keep moderators and players in check when not coding

  • Must have 6 months+ experience and show an example of your work.

Client Developer (In Game Moderator/Administrator May Vary)

  • Pack cache

  • Work with Web Designer on any Webclient Issues

  • Must have 4 months+ experience and show an example of your work

Website Developer (In Game Moderator)

  • Make Professional Website

  • Make Logos

  • Advertisement

  • MySQL servers

  • When not busy keep players in check

  • Must show an example of your work

Open Staff Positions: Head Developer (In Game Owner) [1/1]

                       [s] Nick/Cia Nick[/s]
                                      
                       Server Developers (In Game Administrators)[0/2]

                       Open
                       Open
     
                       Client Developer (In Game Moderator/Administrator May Vary)[0/1]

                       Open
                       
                       Website Developer (In Game Moderator) [0/1]

                       Open

How to Apply:

Apply Below in this format

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: Do you have Skype? If you answer yes what is your Skype Name: Do you have Xbox? If you answer yes what is your Gamertag: What position do you want? (Webdesign, Client Coder, Server Coder): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\
